pageContext.collection_description: The "Papers" portion of the collection contains promotional items, including program schedules, advertisements, newsletters, promotional booklets, cookbooks and press releases. The "Recordings" portion contains more than 20 programs, including the 50th anniversary special in 1972 and a recording of a Bobsled Ride in 1941. The "Photograph" collection contains 5,000 images of the station, 1925-1955.
